Event Table (Rank) Event Table (All) import { Component, Input, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { Table } from 'primeng/table'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; import { SPBefFy10RankPay, SPBefFy10VocAllw, SPBefFy10PilotAllw } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman-tabs.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-payroll-sp-bef-fy10-tab', templateUrl: './nsman-payroll-sp-bef-fy10-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-payroll-sp-bef-fy10-tab.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanPayrollSPBefFy10TabComponent implements OnInit { @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; displayEventTableDialog: any = { display: false }; // Rank Pay Table rankPayList: SPBefFy10RankPay[] = []; rankPayTotalRecords?: number; rankPayLoading?: boolean; rankPayPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } rankPayPageSize = 10; rankPayLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; // Voc Allw Table vocAllwList: SPBefFy10VocAllw[] = []; vocAllwTotalRecords?: number; vocAllwLoading?: boolean; vocAllwPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } vocAllwPageSize = 10; vocAllwLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; // Pilot Allw Table pilotAllwList: SPBefFy10PilotAllw[] = []; pilotAllwTotalRecords?: number; pilotAllwLoading?: boolean; pilotAllwPageData: { currentPage: number } = { currentPage: 0 } pilotAllwPageSize = 10; pilotAllwLazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; rankOnly: boolean; viewValidOrAll = "all"; @ViewChild('rankPayTable', { static: true }) private rankPayTable!: Table; @ViewChild('vocAllwTable', { static: true }) private vocAllwTable!: Table; @ViewChild('pilotAllwTable', { static: true }) private pilotAllwTable!: Table; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // to do } loadRankPayTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.rankPayLoading = true; this.rankPayLazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, this.rankPayPageData, this.rankPayPageSize); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getSPRankPayBefFy10(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.rankPayList = resp.body.data.content; this.rankPayTotalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.rankPayList = []; this.rankPayTotalRecords = 0; } this.rankPayLoading = false; }); }, 0); } onRankPayPage(event: any): void { this.rankPayPageSize = event.rows; this.rankPayPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } loadVocAllwTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.vocAllwLoading = true; this.vocAllwLazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, this.vocAllwPageData, this.vocAllwPageSize); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getSPVocAllwBefFy10(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.vocAllwList = resp.body.data.content; this.vocAllwTotalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.vocAllwList = []; this.vocAllwTotalRecords = 0; } this.vocAllwLoading = false; }); }, 0); } onVocAllwPage(event: any): void { this.vocAllwPageSize = event.rows; this.vocAllwPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } loadPilotAllwTable(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.pilotAllwLoading = true; this.pilotAllwLazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, this.pilotAllwPageData, this.pilotAllwPageSize); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); this.enquiryNSmanService.getSPPilotAllwBefFy10(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.pilotAllwList = resp.body.data.content; this.pilotAllwTotalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.pilotAllwList = []; this.pilotAllwTotalRecords = 0; } this.pilotAllwLoading = false; }); }, 0); } onPilotAllwPage(event: any): void { this.pilotAllwPageSize = event.rows; this.pilotAllwPageData.currentPage = event.first / event.rows; } exportCSV(): void { // to do } showAllRecords(): void { this.rankPayTable.clear(); this.vocAllwTable.clear(); this.pilotAllwTable.clear(); } showValidRecords(): void { this.rankPayTable.clear(); this.vocAllwTable.clear(); this.pilotAllwTable.clear(); this.rankPayTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); this.vocAllwTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); this.pilotAllwTable.filter('Y', 'validInd', 'equals'); } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } setShowRankEventsOnly(): void { this.rankOnly = true; } setShowAllEvents(): void { this.rankOnly = false; } }
